definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: For the application of somatic cell nuclear transfer (SCNT), low cloning efficiency is a great barrier.
sentences.chinese: 效率低下对体细胞克隆技术的应用形成了巨大的障碍。

sentences.english: The freezing process may destroy donor cells and decrease the size of the graft.
sentences.chinese: 冻结过程可能会破坏供体细胞，减少移植物的大小。

sentences.english: Somatic mutation --- A mutation occurring in a somatic cell rather than in the germline.
sentences.chinese: 发生在体细胞而非种系中的可遗传的变异。

sentences.english: Collection of high-concentration cell is the most important step.
sentences.chinese: 高浓度菌体细胞的收集是其生产的关键步骤。

sentences.english: But when they tried such alterations on human cells, they didn't work.
sentences.chinese: 但当他们在人体细胞上尝试这种改变时却遭遇了失败。

sentences.english: Study on Somatic Embryogenesis and Plant Regeneration of Theobroma Cacao L.
sentences.chinese: 可可体细胞胚胎发生及植株再生体系的构建。

sentences.english: They also carried out cytotoxicity tests using human cell cultures.
sentences.chinese: 他们还用培养的人体细胞进行了细胞毒性测试。

sentences.english: Indeed, donor cells can re-uptake their secreted exosomes.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，供体细胞可再吸收它们自身分泌的外泌体。

sentences.english: Histological Observation of Somatic Embryogenesis from Cultured Embryos of Quercus variabilis BI.
sentences.chinese: 栓皮栎体细胞胚胎发生的细胞组织学观察。

sentences.english: It need not add pancreatin to separate the somatic cells of Trichinella spiralis.
sentences.chinese: 旋毛虫的体细胞分离，可以不用加胰酶消化。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the methods for separating somatic cells of Trichinella spiralis and the determination of their activity.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨旋毛虫体细胞的分离方法和活性检测。

sentences.english: All human beings are individual cells in the larger body of humanity.
sentences.chinese: 所有的世人，都是人类这个上层躯体里的个体细胞。

sentences.english: It developed into complete plants on hormon-free MS medium.
sentences.chinese: 体细胞胚在无激素MS培养基上发育成苗。

sentences.english: The present invention discloses production process of somatic cell cloned pig.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种生产体细胞克隆猪的方法。

sentences.english: Results from different treatments showed that the pollen tube growing phenomenon was from the fusion between two types of protoplasts.
sentences.chinese: 不同处理的结果显示，这一现象来源于异核体细胞。

sentences.english: All embryoids originated in the peripheral layer cells of the somatic calli.
sentences.chinese: 全部胚状体来源于体细胞愈伤组织的外围。
